abstract.p: Irish software companies Trintech Group PLC and Baltimore Technologies PLC form partnership to establish secure financial transactions in wireless Internet systems; companies are considered leaders in creating systems that assure confidentiality of data transmitted electronically (S)

block.p: Moving to exploit expected growth in e-commerce over mobile telephones, two Irish software companies formed a partnership to establish secure financial transactions in wireless Internet systems. The alliance between the Trintech Group P.L.C. and Baltimore Technologies P.L.C. includes joint marketing and technology development. The companies are considered leaders in creating systems that assure the confidentiality of data transmitted electronically.

Moving to exploit expected growth in e-commerce over mobile telephones, two Irish software companies formed a partnership to establish secure financial transactions in wireless Internet systems. The companies are considered leaders in creating systems that assure the confidentiality of data transmitted electronically.
